General.Name: Dwi Guna Laksana Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Dwi Guna Laksana Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining and trading activities within electricity sector in Indonesia. It has a concession area in the Jilatan Village, district of Batu Ampar, Regency of Tanah Laut, South Kalimantan. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
